meanings.definition: To make a springing or bounding movement.
meanings.sent1: The frog boings across the lily pads.
meanings.sent2: The ball boings off the wall.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo boings happily in the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The spring boings up and down in the toy.

meanings.sent1: The boings of the coil echoed in the room.
meanings.sent2: I heard the boings of the trampoline in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The boings of the cartoon character added a funny touch.
meanings.sent4: The boings of the music filled the air with joy.
meanings.sent5: The boings of the door spring startled me.
